programme.title: New: Police Interceptors

programme.title: Police Interceptors

programme.desc: Caxton: 'Lots' of fraught auction antics in the riotous reality series. Heavy D risks having his fingers burned. New boys Glyn and James rub the old guard up the wrong way.

programme.title: Storage Hunters UK
programme.desc: Leeds: Sean Kelly starts the bidding in the uber-popular reality series. A new duo are in town and they aren't afraid to throw their weight around. Sam and Ione clash again.

programme.title: Storage Hunters UK
programme.desc: Ipswich: Auction anarchy in the UK. Heavy D is doing what he does best and driving the others mad. Nat, Linda, Boudicca and Ione may have to team up to beat the Boominator!

programme.title: Extreme Salvage Squad
programme.desc: Team Salvage is on a time-critical mission to retrieve a scammed derelict yacht from a crocodile breeding ground, and Team West Coast chase a triple-tow big cash payday.

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: High jinks on the highway in the motoring show. Jeremy and James like to be beside the seaside in two new electric cars, and Richard meets the world's most extraordinary rally team.

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Motor mayhem. A trip to Italy for a supercar shootout featuring the Lamborghini Aventador, the McLaren MP4-12C and the Noble M600.

programme.title: Hairy Bikers' Best of British
programme.desc: Apples and Pears: The Bikers reveal the British obsession with apples, its passion for pears - with dishes including a beef and apple tagine - and the history of Wassailing.

programme.title: Rick Stein's Spanish Christmas
programme.desc: Inspired by his Spanish travels, Rick Stein hosts a festive gathering and shares his take on great dishes to cook for the season, along with Spanish family recipes.

programme.title: Would I Lie To You?

programme.title: Richard Osman's House of Games
programme.desc: Snooker legend Dennis Taylor aims to rack up success when he takes on comedians Yasmine Akram, Cariad Lloyd, and Geoff Norcott in Richard's quizzing showdown this time.

programme.title: Richard Osman's House of Games
programme.desc: Former British Olympian Roger Black joins comedians Jo Brand, Sanjeev Kohli, and Tiff Stevenson in a race to test their general knowledge against Richard's cunning challenges.

programme.desc: Mysteries In The Alien Desert. The Nazca Lines are mysterious symbols that have been carved into the Atacama Desert more than a thousand years ago. How and why were they created? S4, Ep1

programme.title: Expedition Unknown
programme.desc: Hunt For The Chupacabra. Josh Gates embarks on yet another mission, this time into the dark caves and thick jungles of Puerto Rico in search of the mysterious Chupacabra. S6, Ep5

programme.title: Expedition Unknown
programme.desc: Cracking The Secret. Josh Gates travels across America in the hopes of cracking the location of some ceramic vases, buried by an author in 1982 that can be exchanged for treasure. S6, Ep6

programme.title: Alaska: Homestead Rescue
programme.desc: Kentucky Calamity. The Raneys are in Kentucky to help the Tenhagens' homestead devastated by flooding. They devise a mobile escape pen for livestock and a floating greenhouse. S5, Ep6

programme.title: Outback Opal Hunters
programme.desc: Last Chance. The end of the mining season is near. The Rookies gamble their hopes on one last haul of opal and the Opal Queen makes a final desperate dig. S2, Ep13

programme.title: Outback Opal Hunters
programme.desc: The Bushmen clash with opal thieves raiding one of their mines. The Cookes hack an old digging machine, while the Fire Crew hunt for a deposit of rare black opal. S3, Ep1

programme.title: Deadliest Catch
programme.desc: Sailor's Delight. An orca leads the Cornelia Marie to the season's best pots. Plus, when John's autopilot fails, Jake leads him home, and Clark and Sig rush home for Mandy's baby. S18, Ep12

programme.title: Deadliest Catch: Toughest Moments

programme.title: My Feet Are Killing Me
programme.desc: Horse Heels. The doctors attempt to help a woman who is so desperate she's resorted to wrapping her feet in medical tape used by veterinarians on injured horses. S2, Ep5

programme.title: My Feet Are Killing Me
programme.desc: A Smell From Hell. Dr. Brad removes growths like horns coming out of a woman's feet. Plus, Dr. Ebonie helps a woman who hasn't seen her foot in almost two years. S2, Ep6

programme.desc: Kill Gil, Volumes I & II: The Simpsons are stuck with an unwanted house guest, Gil, at Christmas. And he stays for a whole year... until Marge throws him out on Christmas Eve.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The Wife Aquatic: The family visit Barnacle Bay, where Marge grew up, but discover that it's become run-down. Can Homer help to clean up the town?

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: With the truth finally out, Donny's consumed by guilt and plans to flee Hollyoaks. Meanwhile, the teens return to the village, but worries and hidden secrets cause tensions...

programme.title: New: Hollyoaks Does Come Dine
programme.desc: with Me: Brand new series: Will Isabelle Smith's guests go crazy for her Mad Hatter's Tea Party? And how can you win the best Soap Newcomer Award again and again? (Ep2/5)

programme.title: Supercruising: Life at Sea
programme.desc: Caribbean cruisers enjoy a high-octane trip through the Everglades and some alligator spotting, before being treated to a Las Vegas-style performance back onboard. (Ep6)

programme.title: New: Married at First Sight UK
programme.desc: Brand new series: It's time for spouse swapping and bed hopping! Absence makes one groom's heart grow especially fonder, but tests one relationship to the brink of destruction.

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Justin's 25 and has never had a girlfriend; how will Maisie react to the dating methods he learned from a book? Ekow thinks love is insane; will Deborah change his mind?

programme.title: The Pope's Exorcist
programme.desc: (2023) Supernatural horror starring Russell Crowe, loosely based on the memoirs of a 'real' exorcist. A case of demonic possession in Spain connects to dark secrets from the Inquisition.

programme.title: Pearl
programme.desc: (2022) Ti West's exuberant retro horror and prequel to X. Mia Goth is Pearl - a twisted Dorothy who wants to dance up the yellow brick road to movie stardom. Can a seedy projectionist help?

programme.title: Smile
programme.desc: (2022) Gory horror with Sosie Bacon. Following a traumatic incident, a psychiatrist is haunted by a malevolent, gurning presence that drives people to gruesomely kill themselves. Or is she?

programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Tora! Tora! Tora!
programme.desc: (1970) Oscar-winning drama portraying the bombing of Pearl Harbor, from both American and Japanese perspectives. With Joseph Cotten and So Yamamura.

programme.title: Last Night in Soho Interview...
programme.desc: ...Special: Director Edgar Wright and co-writer Krysty Wilson-Cairns discuss travelling through time and recreating the past to make the ingenious and atmospheric psychological thriller.

programme.title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
programme.desc: (2018) Oscar-winning animated superhero adventure with the voices of Shameik Moore, Kathryn Hahn and Nicolas Cage. Can a gang of Spider-heroes save the universe from reality-bending chaos?

programme.title: Sister Act 2: Back in the Habit
programme.desc: (1993) Comedy sequel starring Whoopi Goldberg and Lauryn Hill. Deloris - who's now made it big in Vegas - goes back undercover as a teacher to help a struggling school choir find its voice.

programme.title: Hidden Figures
programme.desc: (2016) Taraji P. Henson, Octavia Spencer and Janelle Monáe star in the Oscar-nominated, fact-based drama about three women whose genius made a significant contribution to the space race.

programme.title: Ticket to Paradise
programme.desc: (2022) Romcom with Julia Roberts and George Clooney. A staggeringly beautiful, divorced couple reunite to stop their daughter's wedding in the staggeringly beautiful surroundings of Bali.

programme.title: Venom: Let There Be Carnage
programme.desc: (2021) Tom Hardy returns as Marvel's gnarly antihero, to face a symbiote spawned from Venom's own blood living inside a serial killer who looks just like Woody Harrelson. Yikes.

programme.title: The House of Mirth
programme.desc: (1999) Gillian Anderson stars as Lily Bart, a spirited member of turn-of-the-century New York society, who gambles with her happiness in Terence Davies's sumptuous, romantic film.

programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: LumoTV: Deaf Funny
programme.desc: Comedy sketch show in BSL with a variety of characters, including a fitness fanatic, a police officer and a football manager.

programme.title: Yesterday's Enemy
programme.desc: (1959) Wartime drama with Stanley Baker. The captain of a British army patrol deciphers secret enemy battle plans, but does so at a great moral cost.

programme.title: Last Night in Soho Interview...
programme.desc: ...Special: Director Edgar Wright and co-writer Krysty Wilson-Cairns discuss travelling through time and recreating the past to make the ingenious and atmospheric psychological thriller.

programme.title: Hell Is a City
programme.desc: (1960) Classic crime thriller with Stanley Baker and Billie Whitelaw. A world-weary detective with a messy private life tracks a violent thief through the streets of Manchester.

programme.title: The Man Between
programme.desc: (1953) Atmospheric thriller set in post-war Berlin, where Ivo Kern (James Mason) and Susanne Mallison (Claire Bloom) get caught up in a maelstrom of bigamy, blackmail and bullets.

programme.title: Siege at Red River
programme.desc: (1954) Western. Van Johnson stars as a Confederate agent who steals a Gatling gun prototype from the Yankees and attempts to smuggle it south through enemy lines to his own side.

programme.title: G.I. Joe: The Rise of Cobra
programme.desc: (2009) Action adventure with Channing Tatum, Sienna Miller and Christopher Eccleston. Terrorists steal a devastating weapon and only the USA's finest - the GI Joes - can stop them.

programme.title: M3GAN
programme.desc: (2022) Creepy-doll horror with Allison Williams. A robotics engineer simultaneously invents an AI dolly and takes on the care of her orphaned niece. But can a cyborg really raise a kid?

programme.title: Bullet Train
programme.desc: (2022) Leaving from Platform 4 - a high octane, Shinkansen-set comedy thriller with Brad Pitt, Joey King and Michael Shannon. A jaded assassin does one last job on a villain-packed train.

programme.title: Barbarian
programme.desc: (2022) Don't-go-down-in-the-cellar horror with Georgina Campbell. A double-booked Airbnb leads a woman into some very dark places beneath the house she's staying in. With Bill Skarsgård.

programme.desc: (1976) Touching romance starring Sean Connery and Audrey Hepburn. The ageing legend Robin Hood returns to Sherwood Forest and discovers that, while he was away, Marian has become an Abbess.

programme.title: The Sound Barrier
programme.desc: (1952) Drama starring Ralph Richardson as a pioneering aviator determined to break the sound barrier, even if it means risking the lives of those closest to him. Directed by David Lean.

programme.desc: (1954) Anthony Asquith's vivid and subtle courtroom drama casts David Niven as the eponymous officer accused of stealing army money and going absent without leave.

programme.desc: Chas and Paddy investigate Rosemary's disappearance and certain discoveries lead them to call the police. Jamie's apologies fail to win over Louise and Donna is injured at work.

programme.title: Classic Emmerdale
programme.desc: Viv's book launch proves to be a flop attended by only a few people, and Marlon is pleased to hear Donna's negative comments about Ross.

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: Sean tells Jamie he's going to be a father but refuses to name the mother. Eileen is annoyed when her friends put a damper on her relationship with Pat.

programme.title: Heartbeat

programme.title: Classic Emmerdale
programme.desc: Donna is unsure whether to attend her police interview but an argument with Marlon spurs her on. Viv is upset about her poor book sales and Jamie covers his tracks over Amelia.

programme.desc: Claire is feeling more positive after her support group meeting. Depressed Steve books himself a cheap holiday to Malta - only Eileen to invite herself along.

programme.title: Downton Abbey
